a.title: A service to plan and fully enjoy your adventure

1.title: What we do
1.text:
We monitor your
ascent in real time.

2.title: Feel the volcano
2.text:
We bring the volcano closer to you, 
so you start living the experience even before climbing!

3.title: Community
3.text:
We put you in touch with other climbers and guides 
to share and plan your experience, and also evacuate doubts.

4.title: Tracker
4.text:
We grant you access to the device before arrival,
so you can start customizing it.

b.title:
The signal that makes
your experience safe
b.text:
We visualize track of your entire journey
and we stay alert. If you need help, you 
simply notify us with the device’s button.

1.title: Tracking
1.text: Our IoT technology shows your real-time location

2.title: Help button
2.text: It allows us to locate you and activate rescue protocols.

c.title:
Internet in the
refuge and base.

1.Q: Where do I pick up the tracking device?
1.A: In one of our authorized points. Find your nearest pick-up point here.

2.Q: How do I use the tracking device?
2.A: To activate the device, enter the “tracker” section in our platform and activate the device by entering its identifier code. You will find a detailed tutorial in that same section that will guide you through all the functions.

3.Q: What do I do with the device upon my return?
3.A: You must return it to one of our pick-up points.

4.Q: Where is wi-fi available in the mountain?
4.A: You have free Wi-Fi access in the shelter and at the base of the mountain. But there is no internet access during the ascent and descent.

5.Q: How do I carry the device during the journey?
5.A: The device uses the IoT and GPS networks to know your location, so it mustn’t remain inside your backpack or pockets.

6.A: Register and ask your questions to the Lanin Experience community. Many experienced people are willing to help you!
